Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Southbound Reroute near 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: Southbound  44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 74th, Loomis, 76th and Racine: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 74th, Loomis, 76th and Racine: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th and Loomis: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th and Loomis: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near  Austin/Washington
ShortDescription: Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Washington, Central, Madison and Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Washington, Central, Madison and Austin, then resume their normal route: due to street blockage near Austin/Washington.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays at LaSalle. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays at LaSalle.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
